$Don Buford hit the ball over the 1B bag; 1B umpire Johnny Stevens ruled foul, then signalled fair; the ball boy down the RF line picked up the ball, then put it down; Rich Reese picked it up and got Dave McNally at HP

$the White Sox scored two runs in the top of the ninth before a 1:29 rain delay; since Chicago went ahead with the two runs, the score reverted back to the end of the eighth inning when the ganme was called; the 9th inning events that didn't count: Watt came in to pitch to start the 9th; Williams: 3/P; Andrews: PH for Johnson and homered to LF; McKinney: 4/P Melton: D/78 Richert replaced Watt as Pitcher May: S7.2-H
